deletePostAfterDays: After how many days should posts be deleted?
fFmpegBin: The project uses FFmpeg and FFProbe to process videos. FFmpeg and FFProbe are either installed globally or stored in the appdatas/ffmpeg folder. See:
fFmpegUseGlobal: FFmpeg and FFProbe are installed globally.
fileTooLarge: The file is too large. The maximum allowed size in bytes is: {0}
invalidVetoId: Invalid ID. A valid ID consists of {PostId}+{UserId}
maxRequestBodySize: Maximum message size to the server
mustBeConverted: The media file is automatically converted after the post is created and cannot be displayed at this time.
name: Name
overrideVeto: A higher veto level is required in order to override the current one.
signInExpirationDays: How many days does a user remain signed in?
signInCodeExpirationHours: How many hours does the email code remain valid?
unknownError: Unknown error. Please try again later.
userAlreadyExists: A user with this e-mail already exists
votingComplete: No more voting possible. The selection process is complete.
